trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Port St Lucie
There were no other sightings in Port St Lucie on or around July 4th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife, niece and I were watching fireworks from our front yard on July 4th 2010. At 9:15 PM I notice what at first I thought was a firework shot into the air, it was very bright almost flarelike. I thought it was getting ready to explode but it never did. We watched as it moved from the SW to NE. At one point it appeared that it sped up then slowed down again. Then suddenly it appeared to go verticle getting smaller and smaller until it disappeared. My wife and I both agree it was definitely not an airplane or anything else we have ever see because of how brilliant it was and the stange way in which it was flying.
Summary: Three of us watching fireworks on the 4th of July 2010 saw a very bright red-orange object move accross the sky, then suddenly go verticle and get smaller and smaller until finally disappearing.
